Custom colors!

This sample implements a custom colors with 1LOC.

Hello world!

I'm the instance of CKEditor.

What happened?

Essentially, this this sample is CKEditor Basicsample but @global-link-font-color has been altered:

@import "../../cke-basic/less/sample.less";
@global-link-font-color: #4369D0;

Learn more about lazy-loading in Less.
